name: 蕭耀榮
objective:
本課程介紹人工智慧深度學習之基礎原理與基本應用，以及智慧型模糊控制之理論與控制器實務。本課程結合理論與實作，讓學生能夠瞭解人工智慧深度學習，深入理解智慧型控制，並進而運用這些技術。課程將介紹人工智慧與深度學習基礎以及實作應用，接著深入介紹模糊邏輯與模糊控制系統的設計與應用。
This course introduces the fundamental principles and basic applications of Artificial Intelligence (AI) Deep Learning (DL), and the theory and practical implementation of intelligent fuzzy control. The course combines theory and practice to make students understand AI DL, intelligent control, and their applications.
schedule:
week1 introduction
week 2-6 AI and Deep Learning on image recognition
week 7 project 01, Writing Exam 01
week 8-14 Fuzzy Logics
week 15 Writing Exam 02
week 16  project 02 discussion
week 17 project 02 presentation
week 18 discussion about project
scorePolicy:
20% Writing Exam 01
20% Writing Exam 02
25% project 01
25% project 02
10% class performance
